name: Smog Busters
description:
You are a smog buster. They fight against the pollution of the many cars in your city.

With your trusty vacuum cleaner, you go around the city and suck in all the smog the cars pollute in your city.

Be fast and precise. Don't leave too much smog around when the night starts.

If you leave too much smog around by night scary ghosts come out of the smog. The ghosts are deadly and will kill you if you touch them. You can only blow them away out of the city and hope they never come back.

Movement: WASD

Left Mouse Click:  Vacuum Sucking

Right Mouse Click: Blowing Away
